CodeExample.Title: Call the Message/Reply action
CodeExample.Summary: To call the Message/Reply action,submit a POST request of the following REST call syntax.
CodeExample.Request:
POST /<version>/myOrganization/groups/<Group.objectId>/Threads/<ConversationThread.Id>/Reply HTTP/1.1 Host : graph.microsoft.com Authorization : Bearer <access_token> Accept : application/json;odata=verbose Content-Length : <body_length>
{ Comment : <Edm.String>, Post : <Microsoft.Graph.Post>, Post : <Microsoft.Graph.Post> }

Remarks.string: A successful call to the Message/Reply action returns an empty response.
